website_summaries.verdict: Looks amazing on, but it takes a bit of effort to get it that way.
pros: Survives lifeguarding, humid track practices, and allergies
Gives the look of long, bold, dramatic lashes
Thick consistency, but can be put in a glass of warm water before use to prevent clumps

customer_reviews.title: Old product. Dry
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy and disappointed. Mascara was mabey new but it was dry. I used those mascaras in passed and i was always super happy with them. When i wanted to return it i got a massage that i need an original box ( i threw it away of course) if not i will be charged 50% or more for packaging fee.
customer_reviews.author: David Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times and usually it is great! But this product that I received is very clumpy. It doesn't go on smooth like it once did. I don't know if I received a bad product or if the formula changed but I am quite unsatisfied. I attempted to contact the seller but have yet to hear back and I bought this the first week of January.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as ratings. Messy
customer_reviews.text: I read how great this mascara was in magazine ratings. First of all it is nearly impossible to remove it entirely. It clumps and it ends up clumped whrre you screw it back on. I tried to clean the outside i made even more of a mess. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D Rochester NY

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara. I don’t wear much makeup but I bought this for our cruise last year and continued buying it after that. In the saltwater it never came off. Not at all! Pictures were great. Goes on pretty nice. Makes them look full. I remove it with extra virgin coconut oil on a cotton pad. I’ve recently found a coconut/avacado oil that I use and it works even better. I just buy them in the cooking aisle by all the other vegetable oils.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pipal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this mascara several times. I'm in the pool everyday. It is absolutely waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Kari M Saunders

customer_reviews.title: My favorite, go-to mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite, go-to mascara. It stays on really well even after swimming. My only minor complaint is that if you aren’t careful, the leftover product can turn into gunk and accumulate around the gap where the top screws on, making a sticky, black mess in the makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Annahue

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing mascara I've ever used from the $6 kind to the $29 kind! Nothing beats the volume this mascara gives you. Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Fall short
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended trying out this brand, the results were not great. It does add volume to lashes, but it is clumpy going on and clumpy coming off. Leaves big clumps in the sink that are not easy to just wipe away. Even my husband noticed the clumsiness both on my lashes and wait was being left behind in the shower/ sink. Would not recommend. Better choices out there for mascara.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I really love Too Faced products and will continue buying them. However, I was very very disappointed about the waterproof mascara I purchased. It is extremely clumpy and I cannot even use it. Maybe I should have purchased through Amazon and gone right to the website, but its brand name so I assumed I would get a quality product and unfortunately I am left disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tesmer

customer_reviews.title: Long, black, fluttery lashes
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara, ever! I have long, but wispy, and almost blonde lashes. They're also pretty sparse. This mascara finds and really makes my lashes stand out. I put on 3 light layers to really make them crazy long and fluttery. It is tough to take off, however. You'll be able to get it off using multiple attempts with a waterproof remover. I find it worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lashes thicker & longer
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this waterproof mascara! I don’t buy any other kind. It makes my thinning lashes appear thicker and longer. I do not use makeup remover to take off the mascara. I use a cream facial cleanser, warm water & cotton wash cloth. This removes 95% of the mascara from my lashes. I also love the black color of the mascara. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Waller

customer_reviews.title: ... stays on all day and the mascara itself is good, the applicator is so thick and difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it stays on all day and the mascara itself is good, the applicator is so thick and difficult to use so the mascara is difficult to apply and can look lumpy if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Hansen-Shinnerl

customer_reviews.title: Super clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this stuff gets good reviews. It is super clumpy. I even tried using a different mascara brush and got the same effect - clumps, clumps and more clumps. It may be waterproof but so is tar and that's what it felt like I was putting on my lashes. Promptly made its way into my trash.
customer_reviews.author: Shanno Clark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely The Best Mascara Ever
customer_reviews.text: Ive struggled for the last few years with my natural lashes not being thick enough and being patchy. I have to tell you after using this mascara for a few weeks I could see an amazing difference in the appearance of my lashes. So easy to apply and just as easy to remove as any other waterproof mascara. There is also a lot of value in the package. Normally I can run through a mascara in a month or so, the packaging gives you so much actual product that I had my first tube last me three months. Yes I bought it again and Ill by it again when I run out. Please remember that this is for natural lashes.
customer_reviews.author: eric hincher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try out this mascara. I heard many good things about it. I have long eyelashes so I thought it could make them look even better. But that wasn't the case. I do not like this mascara at all. It is clumpy, sticky and makes my eyelashes look way shorter than they are. To be honest, imagine sleeping with mascara on what your eyelashes look like in the morning..stuck together and a clumpy mess. This was not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mascara for about 3 years ago. Probably one of the best waterproof I’ve ever used. It’s thick and makes my poor blonde eyelashes look good. I remove it with neutrogena eye makeup remover without problems
customer_reviews.author: Janette Roberts-Mahy

customer_reviews.title: Helps thin, sparse lashes look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! It makes my lashes look Fuller and longer, no joke!! I have thin lashes due to medicines I take and this stuff helps tremendously! It was delivered a few days later than it said, but I still love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenbasham

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mascara out there!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mascara!! It is the best waterproof mascara out there! It gives you great length and volume without any clumps! It is a little difficult to remove, even with eye makeup remover, but with a little scrubbing and eye make up remover it does mostly come off.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasrocks4jesus

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Poor product quality. As other reviewers mentioned, the product was clumpy, does not apply easily and actually DOES smudge throughout the day. The main reason I purchased this product was for it’s smudge resistance properties. Not worth the money. Go to CVS and find something half the price with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: HYA

customer_reviews.title: Not co
customer_reviews.text: Most water resistant mascara I have found. My allergies cause my eyes to water a lot so I constantly have that black smudge under my eyes. This has reduced that smudging pretty well. Goes on nicely, doesnt clump. But is pricey
customer_reviews.author: christy branch

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy right away
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was clumpy the first time I used it. It left small clumps all over my lashes. Very disappointed as I had heard good things about it. Very over priced based on the performance. I will go back to Maybelline stiletto for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kurrie Pelegrin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I have ever used. I continue to buy it because it makes my lashes look super long and it does not smudge.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand in the past but this one didn’t work as expected from previous purchases
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: i loved this at first but it smears off under your eyes during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: So wasted money!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how some people say it's so waterproof... I either got a bad tube or I don't know, but this is NOT waterproof for me, it takes forever to dry and so I get it all around my eyes when trying to put it on, and the shape and diameter of the brush makes it impossible to cleanly apply this to lower lashes without getting it on my skin. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Little hard to remove but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Its a little difficult to remove at first but good makeup wipes can get most of it off. Its probably one of the best mascaras that I've ever owned. I love this stuff. Its absolutely amazing. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Data Gene

customer_reviews.title: I like...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Stays on all day too. Removes with eye make up remover.
customer_reviews.author: Dena M.

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly waterproof. I like that it doesn't run when I workout, but it goes on very clumpy and unnatural looking. It is definitely not better than sex.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof awesome black mascara
customer_reviews.text: Using my spike wands with these But really don’t have too
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sex favorite mascara products
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof formula is not as great as the other non-waterproof mascara. Clumps often
customer_reviews.author: Susie Ragusa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The item is not AT ALL waterproof and will need to return it for a full-refund. In fact it could not be less waterproof and it is all clumped up on the wand and it leaks onto the other things in my makeup bag even when it is closed. Please contact me regarding the refund. I will be sending it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Bramhall

customer_reviews.title: Clumps worse than cheap drugstore mascaras!
customer_reviews.text: Clumps worse than cheap drugstore mascaras! A total rip-off...don't even consider this product. Extremely overpriced. Proving once again that paying more is no guarantee of superior quality in the product or manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product! I can see my eyelashes now.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mascara I’ve ever used. Every female should try it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: dry and clumpy
customer_reviews.text: My mascara came in too dry and clumpy to use. I am assuming that this was more of a handling issue than a problem with the actual product itself. It probably got too hot an dried out somewhere in the distribution chain. Unfortunately, I don't think I will try this product again. Its too expensive to take a risk to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes my eyelashes grow.
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time using a mascara and it makes my eyelashes look like they are so long. Even after washing it off, it just might be how I feel, but my eyelashes look longer than they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I can get the same results from any store brand. I have thin lashes and this barley improved them
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell a difference at all with the length of my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Tatertott87

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this mascara from Sephora and o decided to buy it here and I am very disappointed. This one was clumpy and went on in clumps. Not sure if it is old or something but it was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Hart

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this mascara. It became clumpy very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.  Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I’ve been using the non waterproof one for about a year now and like it. But seems that the waterproof one clumps up a bit more and is hard to remove! That’s why it’s lacking a 5th Star! Still love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice mascara but...
customer_reviews.text: The wand is too thick and makes the mascara clump. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LMarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! It is an amazing volumizing mascara that is waterproof, and it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing any other mascara wouldn't do.....in fact maybe less.  Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The mascara is muddy and does not go on to lashes smoothly. I felt if I spent the extra money on this item, it would enhance my appearance. Waste of money. Do not purchase, at least not on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn matthews

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try Better than sex Mascara and it did not disappoint! Great product, definitely enhanced my thin lashes! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Neko

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and dried up!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand for several years, have always purchased from Ulta and it is an amazing product. But when I ordered from this vendor, the product that I received is totally dried up and clumpy, apparently has been on the shelf for years!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! It really makes your lashes look thicker and longer! My only issue with it is that it is hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovepoms

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MASCARA.
customer_reviews.text: BEST MASCARA I HAVE EVER USED . WATER PROOF TEAR PROOF. LONG LASTING AND LIGHT WEIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: carmine mascitelli

customer_reviews.title: Thick and clumpy!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and clumpy. Wondering if it's old. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Zzzenchantedxx

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This was highly recommended to me, but it still smudged. It might work well for others.
customer_reviews.author: Knittin' Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: A little more $$$ than buying during a sale from a cosmetic store, but convenient to buy and ship with prime. I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: instantly made my lashes long, I love this brand. The packaging and design is so cute, waterdrops on everything and it definitely helps for better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Luvi

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara You have to use waterproof makeup remover to get off. The bottle gets a little messy. But it lasts all day long - even swimming.
customer_reviews.author: MIchele Schafer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: It could be better but it has a nice wand.
customer_reviews.author: Free Spirit Vibes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is awesome. I wish it lengthened a little more, but it is my go to mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Crystif

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this mascara, I love the regular BTS mascara but this is extremely thick and clumped my lashes together so instead of fullness I got clumpiness and it's SO hard to get off. I'll stick to the regular BTS next time
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Thick long lashes
customer_reviews.text: Thick long lashes. Very nice but I sure wish it didn’t dry out so fast
customer_reviews.author: njo_2011

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love love love it ; doesn’t smudge or break while swimming , longer effect for the eyelashes
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lashes
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but I don't see the difference between it and the Almay I used previously. I do like the shape of the brush better
customer_reviews.author: Posey

customer_reviews.title: Love it but so hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: Okay.... so I love this stuff. It makes my lashes look perfect. The only down side to this is that it requires everything shy of paint thinner to remove this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A True Fan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Gives you the perfect balance between long and dark lashes without the clumpy part. Waterproof tested and approved.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mascara lasted all day but it was very clumpy. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Gray

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and not water proof
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is horrible and always smudges, even without water! Would not recommend. It will leave a black smudge on my eye brow.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: they love it.
customer_reviews.text: present for my daughter and now my other daughter wears it too, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Corkum

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara!! It's worth every cent! I have allergies and my eyes water a lot. This mascara stays put and never leaves me with raccoon eyes. I have thick, beautiful lashes all day.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Murney

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad apple
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. But recently ordered on Amazon and wand broke!? Using mascara for 40 years and have never had the wand to “unscrew” and break as it did with this one. Luckily had old mascara and used that want with new product.
customer_reviews.author: LCH11

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of all! Lasts long and gives you a full natural look!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. This was very dry and flaky the first time I used it. I have used this mascara before and it was perfect. I'm not sure if the product from this seller is expired or what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Tube is old, clumps right off the bat. Terrible. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I always but this mascara and it's just as good now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!!! Not even sweat proof!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST “WATERPROOF” MASCARA. Did a light workout and looked like a raccoon. I had no other eye makeup on at all. Two 👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She says it makes her eye lashes look longer and makeup does not run with tears or water.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Acuña

customer_reviews.title: No more volume or length than 12.00 mascara
customer_reviews.text: While many things are better than sex. This mascara probably isn't one of them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Heidemann

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara and receive compliments about my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta M. Immormino

customer_reviews.title: Great product when freash
customer_reviews.text: Shipper sent me.an old one that was dry. Love the product though. It works very well when fresh.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Came unpackaged
customer_reviews.text: My mascara came without being in the package. Not sure what’s going on. this hasn’t happened to me before.
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this product for the cost involved
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product for the cost involved. It went on thin and did not add fullness. I'm not even sure if it's really waterproof. It's so thin it washes rite off.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Koval

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy mascara
customer_reviews.text: This clumps up. So just a little disappointed with that.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S.

customer_reviews.title: this is horrible. I can't believe that I wasted my money ...
customer_reviews.text: this is horrible. I can't believe that I wasted my money on this. I was wishing I would love it so badly. I've heard so many good things about this. I don't know what they were talking about. the mascara is so dry. which is understandable for waterproof. but it's kind of ridiculous. also the smudging is out of control. go with the regular two faced better than sex. it's better.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: VERY waterproof
customer_reviews.text: super lashes but hard to get off - great for special occasions or if very waterproof is needed.
customer_reviews.author: sss

customer_reviews.title: Very clumpy
customer_reviews.text: The mascara is very clumpy, I have to wipe it off on a tissue before I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Luzzi

customer_reviews.title: old!!
customer_reviews.text: It is so clumpy!!! Its so old. I ended up buying it at Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: tracey bennati

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little hard to remove at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best
customer_reviews.text: Better than sex mascara is in my top 3 for waterproof mascaras!
customer_reviews.author: Laura N

customer_reviews.title: not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: It leaves my eyelashes gummy feeling as if it never fully dries. I only use waterproof mascara but this one is particularly difficult to take off with makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: The mascara applicator is bent. It makes it almost ...
customer_reviews.text: The mascara applicator is bent. It makes it almost impossible to apply and the mascara itself is so clumpy on the applicator. I am very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It stays on and increases the volume of my lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Nurs Johns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara, extended length of my lashes, and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: What an incredible product
customer_reviews.text: I am one CHEAP person when it comes to mascara and makeup in general. I had tried my daughter's regular (not waterproof) and my gosh the length and value are incredible! I proudly bucked up 25 bucks for the waterproof brand and have not been disappointed. A lot of people that I know have stopped me over the past 2 months to ask if I had false lashes on or got fillers or extensions. NOPE just TOO FACED BETTER THAN SEX WATERPROOF AND NON WATERPROOF MACARA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best there is!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! I'm tired of my thin, short, eyelashes and was thinking about trying some false eyelashes when a friend of mine suggested Too Faced Better Than Sex mascara, she swore by it showed me pictures before and after and now I swear by it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C

customer_reviews.title: but all of the ones with great effects weren't waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof mascara is INCREDIBLE!!!! I only use waterproof mascaras, but all of the ones with great effects weren't waterproof. This gives me long, bold lashes that look amazing. I don't even have to curl my lashes for whatever reason. I'm a fan for life now.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Howard

customer_reviews.title: absolutely the worst mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: absolutely the worst mascara ever. supposed to be waterproof but I walk around at work all day with raccoon eyes. it's clumpy and smudges easily, I plan to write to the seller and request reimbursement. horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappoint, it smudges
customer_reviews.text: Just received the waterproof the mail today, very disappoint, it smudges . I wish there was some way I could return these product
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible is all I can say, and it was NOT waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves. She's been wanting this mascara for a while now. It's more $$ than she usually gets and it's totally worth it. It stayed on all day at school and track practice in the hot humid air and not a smudge it really stays on. She's super happy with her purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Larson

customer_reviews.title: Clumps and very difficult to remove with eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waterproof version of "better than sex mascara" because the original tends to smudge easily. I was very disappointed at how much this clumped and even with eye makeup remover will not fully come off. It feels sticky on my lashes even by the end of the day. Due to the clumping it is difficult to get top and bottom of the lashe so it looks extremely uneven. Maybe I got an old bottle but this was not a good experience for how much it costs. I will find a different brand due to the smudging of the original kind. I really like how black it is, which is why I tried waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love the regular Better Than Sex Mascara so when i ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the regular Better Than Sex Mascara so when i saw that a waterproof version exists, I got really excited. BUT..this product was a let down. It is very goopy and doesn't seem to dry once applied, thus defeating the point of the waterproof quality. It literally smears and ends up under my eyes by the end of the day, and then at night it is an awful mess to get off of my face because it is"waterproof". stick with the regular version for the perfect plumping, lengthening mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Machree

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER! I have used this exact mascara for years and have always loved it but after purchasing online for the first time, the product was dry and clumpy and my eyes were itchy irritated and red whenever i wore it! I almost thought i had pink eye! Extremely disspointed! Will go back to buying my makeup at ulta where i have NEVER had an issue before with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bebak

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof mascara that's simply the best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I know why this mascara gets such great reviews. I have been using it myself and found that the special-shaped wand can locate, separate, and coat even the tiniest of lashes. The formula earns a "2" on the EWG-Skin Deep website (the lower the score, the better the safety rating), so I feel comfortable using it every day. The mascara lasts until you take it off, leaving no flakes or under-eye smudging. I've found it to be a buildable formula that gives me the most dramatic natural looking lashes with the least amount of application effort. It's hands down the best mascara I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Y

customer_reviews.title: Better than They're Real!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy They're Real! Lengthening mascara regularly, but wanted to try something new. After trying this mascara, I will not return. Compared to They're Real, Better Than Sex mascara is so much better and not at all clumpy. I was really impressed by how long and pretty my eyelashes look after application. Highly recommend this over They're Real!. (In case you were trying to decide)
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and go to Ulta
customer_reviews.text: This was new in package but the product was very thick and clumpy. I tried shaking, stirring, and storing upside down. I was looking forward to trying this but I'm sad. I used it once and it was more mess than anything!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

product_meta.title: Too Faced Better Than Sex Waterproof Mascara 0.27 oz
product_meta.description: Go ahead and cry happy tears, Better Than Sex Mascara is WATERPROOF! Too Faced's iconic hourglass-shaped brush unlocks the volumizing formula that thickens, lengthens, and curls for extreme volume and dramatic lashes. One coat and lashes are full, defined, and stretched to unbelievable lengths. Two coats and lashes look even more luscious, curled, and dramatic. Three coats and you've achieved the most intense, voluminous, waterproof lashes possible!
feature_bullets: Go ahead and cry happy tears, Better Than Sex Mascara is WATERPROOF!
Too Faced's iconic hourglass-shaped brush unlocks the volumizing formula that thickens, lengthens, and curls for extreme volume and dramatic lashes.
One coat and lashes are full, defined, and stretched to unbelievable lengths.
Two coats and lashes look even more luscious, curled, and dramatic.
Three coats and you've achieved the most intense, voluminous, waterproof lashes possible!
